name: Light Bike
description:
Also Available for your mobile device!

Touch left or right to avoid the oncoming motorcycles. See how fast you can drive before crashing into another bike.
You will need to keep your eyes on the road and pick the best route of travel because in this game your bike has no brakes.
Challenge your friends in this addicting game or see if you can drive to the top of the global high scores list.

Music by Kyle Jeremy Neidig.
